name: Endlessriver
body:
### Endless River It's a jQuery plugin, that animates content and make it scroll endlessly! The usefull feature is that you don't have to set widths to elements, because speed is set in pixel/second!! EndlessRiver will calculate the best width for the
  • element and keep speed constant! # Usage Simply include the endlessRiver JS and CSS ```html ``` Create an <ul> list like this ```html
    • |
    • Espresso
    • Cappuccino
    • American
    • Tea
    • Milk
    • Juice
    • |
    ``` and call it like this! ```javascript $(document).ready(function(){ $("#myUl").endlessRiver(); }); ``` **Params** |**option**|**description**|**type** |**default**| | -------- | -------- | -------- | -------- | |speed|Speed of animations in pixel/second|Number|100| |pause|Pause on hover: if true, scrolling will stop on mouseover|Boolean|true| |buttons|If true, shows play/stop buttons|Boolean|false|
